Package ch.iserver.ace.collaboration

The package ch.iserver.ace.collaboration contains the collaboration layer of ACE.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
CollaborationService The CollaborationService is the entry point for all collaboration operations.
DiscoveryCallback Callback interface for explicit discovery requests through CollaborationService.discoverUser(DiscoveryCallback, InetAddress, int).
DocumentListener Discovery listener interface for documents.
Invitation This interface represents an invitation from another user to an editing session.
InvitationCallback Callback interface for invitations sent to the local user.
JoinCallback Callback interface for join requests.
JoinRequest Request passed to the application layer whenever another user tries to join a published document.
Participant A Participant is a contributor to an editing session.
ParticipantSessionCallback The ParticipantSessionCallback extends the SessionCallback interface and adds methods used only for sessions in which the local user is a participant.
PortableDocument Document passed to the ParticipantSessionCallback.setDocument(PortableDocument) method.
PublishedSession A PublishedSession extends a Session with methods that are only available to the owner (publisher) of the session itself.
PublishedSessionCallback This interface describes the contract between the logic layer and the application layer for PublishedSession callbacks.
RemoteDocument The RemoteDocument interface provides methods applicable to remote documents that were discovered, most notable is the join method which allows to send a join request to the document.
RemoteUser A RemoteUser is a local representation of a remote user.
ServiceFailureHandler A ServiceFailureHandler can be registered with the collaboration layer in order to receive service failure events.
Session A session represents one particular editing session of a shared document.
SessionCallback Callback interface used by sessions to notify the application about events in the session.
UserListener Discovery listener interface for users.
 

Class Summary
DiscoveryResult A DiscoveryResult object contains the result of an explicit discovery request through the method CollaborationService.discoverUser(DiscoveryCallback, InetAddress, int).
 

Package ch.iserver.ace.collaboration Description

The package ch.iserver.ace.collaboration contains the collaboration layer of ACE.
